attributes.action: legalize the production of cannabis for personal use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the more of us that sign this petition the more notice has to be taken of it.
many thousands of people in this country use cannabis for differant reasons, whatever your reasons we all need to pull together as one to get the gov. to take notice of what the real people want and not the mp's who say they represent us.
please sign and get your friends to sign also. thank you all...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
